thread.title: Nitish Kumar, Lalu Prasad doing vote-bank politics on triple talaq: RSS
thread.title_full: Nitish Kumar, Lalu Prasad doing vote-bank politics on triple talaq: RSS - The Financial Express

author: IANS
title: Nitish Kumar, Lalu Prasad doing vote-bank politics on triple talaq: RSS
text:
RSS leader Indresh Kumar on Sunday attacked Bihar Chief Minister Nitish Kumar and RJD chief Lalu Prasad. (PTI) RSS leader Indresh Kumar on Sunday attacked Bihar Chief Minister Nitish Kumar and RJD chief Lalu Prasad, saying both leaders have been doing vote-bank politics by supporting triple talaq and opposing a uniform civil code.
Indresh, known for his vocal defence of Hinduvta politics, said: “Nitish Kumar, who is also the JD-U President, and Lalu have been playing politics to break the country for the sake of vote.”
“There is an urgent need for one law in the country. There cannot be a separate law for any one,” the Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RSS) leader added.
You may also like to watch this video :
Indresh also had a personal poser for Nitish and Lalu: “Will they allow their sons to give talaq to their wives?”
Indresh said those, who are against one nation-one law theory, are free to leave the country for any other place.
